description: Runtime enforcement rules - blocks wrong runtimes and suggests correct alternatives

rules.message: Use `bun` instead of `node` for JavaScript/TypeScript files. All scripts use inline dependencies that require bun.
Use `bun` instead of `npm` for package management.
Use `bunx` instead of `npx` for package execution.
Use `uv run` instead of `python` for Python scripts. All scripts use inline dependencies (PEP 723) that require uv.
Use `uv run` instead of `python3` for Python scripts. All scripts use inline dependencies (PEP 723) that require uv.
Use `uv run -m` instead of `python -m` for module execution.
